body_html:
Instructions at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux say:

"If you have an earlier version of the preceding packages..." (such as cuDNN < 6.0) "...you may still run TensorFlow with GPU support, but only if you do the following:

Install TensorFlow from sources as documented in Installing TensorFlow from Sources."

Sorry the instructions are so long, I know it's easy to miss this.
body_text:
Instructions at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux say:
"If you have an earlier version of the preceding packages..." (such as cuDNN < 6.0) "...you may still run TensorFlow with GPU support, but only if you do the following:
Install TensorFlow from sources as documented in Installing TensorFlow from Sources."
Sorry the instructions are so long, I know it's easy to miss this.
body:
Instructions at [https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux) say:

"If you have an earlier version of the preceding packages..." (such as cuDNN < 6.0) "...you may still run TensorFlow with GPU support, but only if you do the following:

Install TensorFlow from sources as documented in Installing TensorFlow from Sources."

Sorry the instructions are so long, I know it's easy to miss this.
